```{r load_data, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = "hide"}


denver_boundary <-read_sf("Denver/Processed/denver_bound.shp")


```

```{r create_fishnets, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = "hide"}

fishnet <- st_make_grid(denver_boundary,
                        cellsize = 1320,
                        square = TRUE) %>% 
  .[denver_boundary] %>% 
  st_sf() %>% 
  mutate(uniqueID = rownames(.))

ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data = fishnet,
          fill = "lightgrey")+
  geom_sf(data = denver_boundary, 
          color = "red", fill = "transparent")

```
